recommendations: August 29, 2011, Robb was a client of Jason’s

I have hired Jason on several occasions to write music for interactive media/gaming platforms. Dealing with Jason on both a personal professional level is a joy. With every meeting, he brings a refreshing air of courtesy, optimism, and politeness to the table. His positive attitude is coupled with an excellent understanding of music and an ability to compose perfectly fitting music in a variety of styles with aplomb, and often ahead of schedule. Jason is a 'triple threat' hire; an accomplished performing musician, an impressive and versatile composer, and a genuinely pleasant person to do business with. I have and will continue to call on Jason whenever I'm in a pinch and need a few more capable hands (and ears) on a music composition job.

June 11, 2014, John was senior to Jason but didn’t manage directly

From 2009 to 2010, John was my mentor as I started work as Test Engineer at WMS Gaming.  John was a spectacular mentor, always willing to share his technical knowledge, field questions, and go above and beyond expectations to get the job done.  John was both a great teacher and a wonderful "lead by example" type of employee.  It became apparent before long that John was someone our department looked to for leadership.John and I worked side by side on several projects during that time, with John as the project lead.  Each project on which we worked together had comprehensive planning, execution, and follow through (and ultimately quality and success).  I attribute much of my own approach to projects being shaped by that time working with John.

November 5, 2011, Jason was senior to Wil but didn’t manage directly

During our time together at LucasArts, Wil was an excellent Compliance Tester.  He showed total commitment and responsibility for the software he tested, and he was as eager as anyone to deliver a clean product.  Wil was almost always the first person from the Compliance team into the office each morning, already hard at work when the rest of us arrived.  I would recommend Wil as a member of any team.
